attributes.action: Remove all "Green Tax" until such time c02 can be directly linked to Global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Green tax is a taxation that penalises the country for something that there is not sufficient evidence that c02 causes global warming. I would call for all green taxation to be removed until such time there is conclusive evidence that c02 causes global warming.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
